message: Note: This is an auto-generated email, please do not reply. Dear {0}, You have requested to send your password dated {1}. =========== REGISTRATION INFO =========== e-Mail: {2} Password: {3} In case you did not request for your password to be sent, we advise you to change it immediately. Please click the link to change your password from the Profile page, www.garmco.etendering.com/Account/Profile.aspx. Yours sincerely, GARMCO Customer Service www.garmco.com https://etendering.garmco.com
